mapper.delete: delete from dingtalk_user where userid = #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER} and is_admin=0
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into dingtalk_user (userid, `name`, `position`, mobile, tel, workPlace, remark, email, orgEmail, jobnumber, isHide, isSenior, intermediary_id, `password`, extattr,head_pic,is_admin ) values (#{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{position,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{workplace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgemail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jobnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ishide,jdbcType=BIT}, #{issenior,jdbcType=BIT}, #{intermediaryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{extattr,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},#{headPic,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{isAdmin,jdbcType=INTEGER} )

`name` = #{record.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
`position` = #{record.position,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mobile = #{record.mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tel = #{record.tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

`name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update dingtalk_user set `name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `position` = #{position,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tel = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, workPlace = #{workplace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, orgEmail = #{orgemail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, jobnumber = #{jobnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, isSenior = #{issenior,jdbcType=BIT}, extattr = #{extattr,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where userid = #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select * from dingtalk_user WHERE intermediary_id = #{intermediaryId} AND name LIKE concat('%',#{name},'%');
SELECT b.* FROM sys_user_role a,dingtalk_user b where a.user_id=b.userid AND a.role_id=#{0}

select u.userid id, u.`name`, dp.id parentId, 'person' type FROM dingtalk_user u LEFT JOIN dingtalk_user_dept udp ON u.userid = udp.user_id LEFT JOIN dingtalk_dept dp ON udp.dept_id = dp.id WHERE dp.intermediary_id = #{iId} and dp.path LIKE concat('%',#{path},'%')
select u.*, iu.intermediary_user_status status from dingtalk_user u LEFT JOIN intermediary_user iu ON u.userid = iu.intermediary_user_uId WHERE iu.intermediary_user_iId = #{0}
